data.title: Should I buy coats a size up or a size down if I'm stuck between sizes?
data.meta_description: Answer (1 of 44): That really depends on how the individual coat feels on you. NEVER assume that you can tell from the size on the tag whether any article of clothing will fit you. There are some brands that make their clothing as much as 2 sizes larger than some others. You can usually make a go...
